QuestData.Title: In Defense of Quel'Danil
QuestData.Description: The undead are here! The Forsaken! They've been moving closer and closer, but to launch an all-out attack on us... those horrid abominations!$B$BThe young draenei I was charged with have trained with the Highvale elves in combat. They are not defenseless, but they need help!$B$BPlease, $n, assist them! Drive back the Forsaken!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 16 Deathstalker Invaders at Quel'Danil Lodge.
QuestData.RewardText: Such aberrations in the face of the light... You are brave to face them, $n.
